mapper.insert:
select resume_seq.nextval from dual
insert into resume values(#{resumeNo},#{userNo},#{location1},#{location1}, #{jobType1},#{jobType2},#{sal},#{selfIntTitle},#{selfInt},sysdate)

select EDUCATION_seq.nextval from dual
insert into education values(#{eduCode},#{finalEdu},#{uni},#{uniName},#{eduLocation}, #{eduPeriod},#{major},#{eduScore},#{resumeNo})

select career_seq.nextval from dual
insert into career values(#{careerCode},#{careerCompany},#{careerPeriod},#{careerReason},#{task}, #{resumeNo},#{careerRank},#{careerYear},#{careerLocation},#{careerSal})

select LANGUAGE_seq.nextval from dual
insert into LANGUAGE values(#{languageCode},#{kinds},#{testName},#{langScore},#{rating},#{langGetDate},#{resumeNo})

select addinfo_seq.nextval from dual
insert into addinfo values(#{infoCode},#{disable},#{military},#{affair},#{sFund},#{resumeNo})

select active_seq.nextval from dual
insert into active values(#{actCode},#{activity},#{actPlace},#{actPeriod},#{actContent},#{resumeNo})

select award_seq.nextval from dual
insert into active values(#{awardCode},#{awardName},#{awardCom},#{awardGetDate},#{resumeNo})

select potfolio_seq.nextval from dual
insert into active values(#{potCode},#{potFile},#{potPeriod},#{workers},#{intro},#{resumeNo})

select Certify_seq.nextval from dual
insert into active values(#{certifyCode},#{certifyName},#{certifyPlace},#{certifyGetDate},#{resumeNo})
